mapper.select: SELECT commentId,articleId,a.userId, targetCommentId,replyCommentId,commentText, commentTime, (SELECT count(*) FROM commentup where a.commentId = commentup.commentId )AS commentUpNumber ,commentType,immediateNumber,userName,userHeadUrl, (SELECT c.userName FROM user c WHERE c.userId = (SELECT d.userId FROM comment d WHERE d.commentId = a.targetCommentId )) AS replyTo FROM comment a,user b WHERE targetCommentId=#{commentId} AND commentType in(1,2) AND a.userId = b.userId ORDER BY commentUpNumber DESC LIMIT #{page},10

SELECT commentId,articleId,a.userId, targetCommentId,replyCommentId,commentText, commentTime,commentType, immediateNumber, (SELECT count(*) FROM commentup where a.commentId = commentup.commentId )AS commentUpNumber,userName,userHeadUrl, (SELECT count(*) FROM comment c WHERE c.targetCommentId = a.commentId )AS replyNum FROM comment a,user b WHERE articleId=#{articleId} AND a.userId = b.userId ORDER BY commentUpNumber DESC LIMIT #{page},10

SELECT commentId,articleId,comment.userId, targetCommentId,replyCommentId,commentText, commentTime,commentType, immediateNumber, (SELECT count(*) FROM commentup where comment.commentId = commentup.commentId )AS commentUpNumber,userName,userHeadUrl FROM comment,user WHERE comment.userId=#{userId} AND comment.userId = user.userId ORDER BY commentTime DESC LIMIT #{page},10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(articleId,userId,targetCommentId, replyCommentId,commentText,commentTime, commentType,immediateNumber) VALUES (#{articleId},#{userId},#{targetCommentId}, #{replyCommentId},#{commentText},#{commentTime}, #{commentType},#{immediateNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT commentId,articleId,comment.userId, targetCommentId,replyCommentId,commentText, commentTime, (SELECT count(*) FROM commentup where comment.commentId = commentup.commentId )AS commentUpNumber ,commentType,immediateNumber,userName,userHeadUrl FROM comment,user WHERE replyCommentId=#{commentId} AND commentType in(1,2) AND comment.userId = user.userId ORDER BY commentTime DESC LIMIT #{page},10

SELECT commentId,articleId,comment.userId, targetCommentId,replyCommentId,commentText, commentTime,commentType, immediateNumber, (SELECT count(*) FROM commentup where comment.commentId = commentup.commentId )AS commentUpNumber,userName,userHeadUrl FROM comment,user WHERE comment.userId=#{userId} AND immediateNumber > 0 AND comment.userId = user.userId ORDER BY commentTime DESC
